replies.body:
These would contribute to a punishment, and depending on how recent the 14 day ban was that punishment would be a permanent ban. You can claim ignorance thinking you were to receive another 14 day ban, but the reform card from your 14 day ban stated that continuing poor behavior would result in a permanent ban.

We also aren't here for "he started it" or "they were worse". Everyone is judged for their own behavior. Another persons behavior does not justify poor behavior in response.
my 14 day was 3 to 4 months ago not recent at all. and ik that being toixc is gonna have consequences but for that. i dont belive perma is fair at all.

Is that 3 to 4 months of consistent playing? Time passed is based on gane time played. Not playing for a year is the same as not playing for a week as far as punishments go for reforming. If this is normalish behavior for you, it probably wouldn't help demonstrate reform either.
I played almost every day i was lv 222
Do you recall honor level?
yes
And what was the level?
1 i think

but does that deserve a perma for that little bit ive had 1 14day thats it i thought you were supposed to get 2 14 then perma i know what i said is toxic but i cant help when im getting flamed by the whole game cause of a bad game im not gonna sit there when someone is calling me a f word
wrong question.  The correct question is "does that deserve a **punishment**?"
yes it deserves a chat ban i agree not a perma

The only reason you got perma for this is because you previously received a 14-day ban.  The next punishment is perma.  If this deserve a punishment (and it does), then the perma is justified because that is the next tier in **punishment**.  You don't get to keep receiving chat restriction forever.  It doesn't work out well when Rito did that.  At some point, if you keep being toxic after getting 14-day, then Rito will just have to tell you to GTFO.  That point is now.
How many chat bans should Riot give you when it’s clear they aren’t working?
ive had 1 to 2 chat bans and they worked for about 2 month ive had chat off for a while i thought i was ready to play league with chat again but i guess not.
Then they didn’t work. Working for a month or two is not working. You didn’t change your behavior. They didn’t work.
i mean if i wasnt talking for about 2 months i think it worked.

But you came back and misbehaved again.

You did not change your behavior. It’s like you got a speeding ticket and then just didn’t drive for two months. The speeding ticket didn’t work. You still thought speeding was okay.

You still thought this behavior was okay. So it didn’t work.
when did i ever say it was ok. anger can make you do thing you will regret.

You must face the consequences of your anger then. Your refusal to control yourself is the problem that got you permanently banned. You were given multiple chances to learn to control yourself and you didn’t. That is solely your fault.
i agree. but thats way to harsh for what i said.

Again - how many chances do you need? It told you very clearly when you had a 14 day ban that this was the next step.

You don’t get infinite chances in life.

More importantly, it is your (Patyy) responsibility to understand the rules. It's the same in any culture- nobody is going to sit you down and teach you the rules, you have to learn them on your own. I agree that it is harsh, but that is irrelevant.

Hope the perma was worth.
